FuncDef:
The damp-interface ignore-global command enables an interface to ignore the global damp-interface function.
The undo damp-interface ignore-global command disables an interface from ignoring the global damp-interface function.
By default, the damp-interface function on an interface is the same as the global configuration.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the damp-interface function is enabled globally using the damp-interface enable command run in the system view but you want to disable this function on some interfaces, run the damp-interface ignore-global command on these interfaces to enable them to ignore the global damp-interface function.
Configuration Impact
After the damp-interface ignore-global command is run on an interface, the global damp-interface function stops taking effect on the interface.
